item.title: Mastering Windows User Accounts: Secure Access for Better Control
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "System Administration" , "Windows Management" , "User Access Control" , "Permission Management" , "IT Security" , "Command-line Tools" , "User Authentication" , "File Permissions" , "Elevated Privileges"
item.description: Learn how to manage user accounts and permissions on Windows for enhanced cybersecurity and system control. Explore user management commands, file permissions, and running commands with elevated privileges.

item.title: Password Security Checklist: Strengthening Your Accounts and Protecting Sensitive Information
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Password Security" , "Account Protection" , "Sensitive Information" , "Password Management" , "Multi-Factor Authentication" , "Security Guidelines" , "Strong Passwords" , "Password Managers" , "Secure Storage" , "Password Confidentiality"
item.description: Discover essential guidelines for creating strong passwords, tips for effective password management, and instructions for setting up multi-factor authentication to enhance the security of your accounts.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Importance of Physical Security
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity

item.description: Enhance your understanding of physical security and its significance in network protection with this comprehensive Network+ course. Learn best practices for implementation, switchport security, password complexity enforcement, and more.
